song.title: Nothing But The Blood
song.author: Robert Lowry
song.lyrics:
[INTRO] .D Bm7 G A D
[1] .D Bm7 What can wash away my sin .G2 A D Nothing but the blood of Jesus .D Bm7 What can make me whole again .G2 A D Nothing but the blood of Jesus
[C] .D Bm7 Oh precious is the flow .Asus That makes me white as snow .D Bm7 No other fount I know .G2 A D Nothing but the blood of Jesus --- .Order ;1 2 C 3 Cx2 4 Cx2
[2] For my pardon this I see, Nothing but the blood of Jesus For my cleansing this my plea Nothing but the blood of Jesus
[3] Nothing can for sin atone Nothing but the blood of Jesus Naught of good that I have done Nothing but the blood of Jesus [4] This is all my hope and peace Nothing but the blood of Jesus This is all my righteousness Nothing but the blood of Jesus
-!! [T] .D What can wash away our sins .Bm7 What can make us whole again .A Nothing but the blood .G D A G Nothing but the blood of Jesus .D What can wash us pure as snow .Bm7 Welcomed as the friends of God .A Nothing but Your blood .G D Nothing but Your blood King Jesus
